column2: text
Hello there, I’m the all-mighty hive mind.
Nice to finally meet you.
Let’s start with something simple. Try to infect these poor, defenseless elders.
You should be able to do this pretty easily, I hope.
Great job, now see these young humans?
Their sole purpose is to annoy everybody around them. I would cover my ears if I had any.
It’s time to give them a present. Infect all of them!
Unless you feel sorry for them in which case…well, do it anyway.
They move faster and are harder to get infected so be wise with your choices.
Mmmm…those garbage bins smell delicious. But they are useful as well.
They are not human, a fact I really hope you realized before I said it,  but they can be used to spread spores as well.
You can take some snacks from there after you are finished.
Look at these pathetic business humans.
Running around all day yelling at everybody.
And they honestly believe they are doing something important.
Even I could do that. If, you know, I had a real body.
Anyway, let’s make them actually useful.
These small creatures are called squirrels.
They are always moving. It’s driving me crazy.
Although, I must admit they look cute.
Try to infect them! Let’s see how much cuter they will become.
Those evil walls are making our work much more complicated.
We need to do something about them.
No, we won’t be infecting them. How would that even work?
No, do you see those flying squirrels? They are called birds.
Infect them, and they will fly over the walls.
What's the point of this virologist?
Why would she help others stay healthy when they will all die anyway?
Pretty useless if you ask me.
How about showing her how useless her job actually is?
Oh, this won’t be that easy.
He would kill any infected humans close to him.
Even children and elders.
He probably finds them as annoying as I do.
However, he has a soft spot for animals, so…you know. Animals.
Go for it. Don’t disappoint me!
